oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Liberace with Gayle Gupton in Lebanon, Tennessee, 1954 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Liberace, a famous American pianist and vocalist, posing with civic leader, banker, and politician Gayle Lewis Gupton (center) and an unidentified man, in Lebanon, Tennessee. Liberace, a famous and flamboyant entertainer (born Wladziu Valentino Liberace), was the highest-paid entertainer in the world during the 1950s-1970s. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Liberace, 1919-1987; Gupton, Gayle L., 1924-1983
Entertainers--Tennessee--Nashville; Celebrities; Civic leaders--Tennessee--Nashville
